A valve acaba se influenciando com outras corporações que só buscam o lucro. O jogo está repleto de trapaças e xiter's e a empresa não toma uma única atitude em busca de ajudar seus verdadeiros fãs. Só pensam em vender e lucrar com skins. O CS:GO não dura 2 anos desse jeito.

Once you get past the garbage first 10 hours of the game you get the best player base experience that is humanly possible.
Timeless tactical shooter. Great if you dont mind taking some time to learn the mechanics.
games chuffed. got around 7k hours across 3 accounts and jesus christ.

I've played this game for almost 5800 Hours according to Steam, however many of those are AFK hours where i would leave the game running. I believe i have personally around 2500 or so Real In-Game Hours.

Pros:
It is a fairly easy game to learn, if you are willing to put the time into learning recoil/spray patterns, and communicate well with others.
There are a handful of people who will teach you the game.
Installation is quick.

Cons:
Competitive Scene is toxic, which I know I'm a part of.
Everyone thinks they are the AWPer (Sniper), and will get mad if you choose to do the same.
CS:GO Skins are addicting to purchase/Gamble, so either have self-control or realize that just because the game is now free, doesn't mean that you won't spend money on cosmetics.
In my opinion, it is the best FPS game ever!
oh come on valve. f u c ki ng hell why do you like to ruin this game. Pleaaase no more character skins. You will be compared to fortnite.
Una de las mejores saga... sin duda, increíble trabajo. El mejor FPS del mundo.

Recomendo o jogo.
Mas enquanto a Valve não arrumar seus servidores e não ajustar melhor sua forma de banimento, o jogo perdeu a graça.
De um dia para o outro são lags constantes sendo que até semana passada não tinha este problema. Não é erro de conexão, porque em inúmeros outros jogos não tenho problema de ping, somente aqui.
E quanto aos players, depois que o jogo passou a ser grátis, o uso de programas de hack aumentaram consideravelmente.
Macht seit Jahren Spass, F2P hat das Spiel etwas zerstört.

CS:GO has very nice skill based game-play in competitive. Casual is still fun, but I would not recommend it as much. 10/10 would play again >:D
